site_name: UNIVERSITY OF TEXAS AT PERMIAN BASIN

citations.desc: INSTITUTIONAL ANIMAL CARE AND USE COMMITTEE (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
At the time of this inspection, no IACUC meeting minutes since April 23, 2014 were available to the APHIS official
for review. IACUC evaluations of the animal care program and facility semi-annual reviews must be conducted
every six months and be made available for review during regular business hours. To be corrected by: December
31, 2014.
Inspection and exit briefing conducted with facility representative.

narrative:
2.31(c)(3)
INSTITUTIONAL ANIMAL CARE AND USE COMMITTEE (IACUC).
At the time of this inspection, no IACUC meeting minutes since April 23, 2014 were available to the APHIS official
for review.  IACUC evaluations of the animal care program and facility semi-annual reviews must be conducted
every six months and be made available for review during regular business hours.  To be corrected by:  December
31, 2014.
Inspection and exit briefing conducted with facility representative.
